issue.message: Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "source", in androidx.lifecycle.GeneratedAdapter.callMethods) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "source", in androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleEventObserver.onStateChanged) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
issue.errorLine1: void onStateChanged(@NonNull LifecycleOwner source, @NonNull Lifecycle.Event event);
